item.description:
In addition to share some more amazing food, lets share our strategies and recipes for keeping our holiday season manageably raw.
Please bring a favorite raw holiday recipe and/or your ideas for navigating the days ahead.

SPECIAL SPIRIT OF GIVING OPPORTUNITY!!!
With the Winter cold already biting and blowing, now is a perfect time to share some of your abundance with those far less fortunate. We'll be collecting donations for Prebble Street Homeless Shelter in Portland which Jen will be dropping off on the 20th right before Yule/Christmas.
PLEASE BRING
any LAUNDERED & CLEAN old or extra items you have to share.
All sizes welcome (kids & adults)
Coats
Scarves, Hats, Mittens & Gloves
Shoes
Boots
SOCKS!!!!!
Long Underwear
Warm Clothes
Sweaters
Sunglasses
Blankets
Sleeping Bags
Towels
Toiletries (like soap, shampoo, lotion)
Reusable Shopping Bags, Tote Bags, Backpacks & even plastic grocery bags

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Holidays vs Holidaze Making it Rawsome! Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!
